text: The Lithuanian Football Federation (; LFF) is the governing body of football in Lithuania. The association organizes the Lithuanian football league A Lyga, the Lithuania national football team and the Lithuania national futsal team. It is based in Vilnius, the Lithuanian capital. The association was founded in 1922. In 1923, it became a member of FIFA. In 1992, it became a member of UEFA. == Other websites == * Official website * Lithuania at FIFA site * Lithuania at UEFA site Category:1922 establishments in Europe Category:Establishments in Lithuania Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe Category:Sport in Lithuania Category:Organizations based in Lithuania Category:Vilnius
title: Lithuanian Football Federation
